mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INGREDIENT (category, name, name_eng, sale, inventory, sale_status, flavor, explanation, photo) VALUES(#{category}, #{name}, #{nameEng}, #{sale}, #{inventory}, #{saleStatus}, #{flavor}, #{explanation}, #{photo})
mapper.select: SELECT ingredient_id as id, category, name, name_eng, sale, inventory, sale_status, flavor, explanation, create_dt, update_dt FROM INGREDIENT WHERE 1=1 AND ingredient_id = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE INGREDIENT SET category = IFNULL(#{category}, category), name = IFNULL(#{name}, name), name_eng = IFNULL(#{nameEng}, name_eng), sale = IFNULL(#{sale}, sale), inventory = IFNULL(#{inventory}, inventory), sale_status = IFNULL(#{saleStatus}, sale_status), flavor = IFNULL(#{flavor}, flavor), explanation = IFNULL(#{explanation}, explanation), photo = IFNULL(#{photo}, photo) WHERE 1=1 AND ingredient_id = #{id}
